column2: "Nda kakra bi ekyir no
column4: na wɔtsee dɛ ɔwɔ fie."

column2: "Na dodowara behyiaa mu
column3: ma nna wonnya kwan bio mma hɔn
column4: nnyɛ abowano hɔ mpo; na ɔkaa asɛm no kyerɛɛ hɔn."

column2: "Na wɔdze mbubuinyi a nyimpa baanan so no baa no hɔ."
"Na ɔnam nyimpadodow no ntsi na wonnya kwan nntwe mmbɛn no no
column3: wɔkɛpaa dan a ɔwɔ mu no etsifi; na wotuu mu tu na wɔdze kɛtɛ a mbubuinyi no da do no duaa mu gyaagyaa mu sii famu."

column2: "Na Jesus hun hɔn gyedzi no
column4: Ɔba

column2: "Nna kyerɛwfo no binom tsetse hɔ
column3: na wɔdwendween hɔn akoma mu dɛ
column5: "Ɔyɛ dɛn na oyi kasa dɛm yi? Ebususɛm na ɔka: woana botum dze bɔn akyɛ dɛ Nyankopɔn nkotsee?"

column2: "Na ntsɛmara Jesus hun wɔ no sunsum mu dɛ wɔrodwendwen dɛm wɔ hɔn akoma mu no
column4: Ebɛnadze ntsi na hom rodwendwen dɛm wɔ hom akoma mu yi?"

column2: "Dza ɔwɔ hen na ɔyɛ mberɛw kɛse
column4: Wɔdze wo bɔn akyɛ wo

column2: "Na mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ ma hom ehu dɛ nyimpa Ba no wɔ tum wɔ asaase do dɛ ɔdze bɔn kyɛ ntsi
column7: fa wo kɛtɛ na kɔ wo fie."

column2: "Na ɔsoɛree
column4: na osii mu wɔ hɔn nyina enyim kɔree. Na ɔmaa hɔn nyina ho boow hɔn
column6: Yennhun dɛm adze yi bi da."

column2: "Na opuee bio kɔr mpoano; na nyimpadodow no nyina kɔr no hɔ
"Na ɔresen no ohun Alfaeus ne ba Levi dɛ ɔtse atowgyebea
column4: Ka mo do.  Na ɔsoɛree kaa no do."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔtse edzidzi wɔ ne fie no; atowgyefo nye ndzebɔnyɛfo pii nye Jesus na n'esuafo bɛtsenatsenaa hɔ: nna hɔn a wɔka no do no dɔɔ so."
"Na akyerɛwfo a wofi Farisiifo no mu no hun dɛ ɔnye ndzebɔnyɛfo nye atowgyefo ridzidzi no
column4: Ɔyɛ dɛn na ɔnye atowgyefo nye ndzebɔnyɛfo dzidzi nom yi?"

column2: "Na Jesus tsee no ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: wonnhia oduyɛfo
column5: na mbom hɔn a wɔyar no a: mammbɛfrɛ atseneneefo

column2: "Nna John n'esuafo nye Farisiifo no ridzi mbuada: na binom bae bebisaa no dɛ
column3: Ɔyɛ dɛn na John n'esuafo nye Farisiifo hɔn esuafo no wodzi mbuada
column4: na w'esuafo dze

column2: "Na Jesus see hɔn dɛ
column4: aber a ayeforkun no wɔ hɔn nkyɛn no
column5: aso wobotum edzi mbuada anaa? Aber tsentsen biara a wɔwɔ ayeforkun no wɔ hɔn nkyɛn no

column2: "Na nda bɛba a wobeyi ayeforkun no efi hɔn nkyɛn
column3: na da no mu nkyii wobedzi mbuada."

column2: "Obi mmfa tam fofor sin nntaa atar dadaw mu: dɛm no
column3: dza wɔdze taa mu no yi fi mu
column4: fofor no fi dadaw no mu

column2: "Na obi mmfa wenyin fofor nngu nwomantoa dadaw mu; dɛm no
column4: na wenyin no asɛɛ
column5: ɔnye nwomantoa no so: na wenyin fofor dze

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ Jesus kɛfaa eburow kwa mu ahomgyeda bi; na n'esuafo no nam rokɔ no
column3: wɔhyɛɛ ase pempaan eburow mbɛtsem no bi."

column2: "Na Farisiifo no see no dɛ
column4: ɔyɛ dɛn na wɔreyɛ dza ɔmmfa mbra mu wɔ ahomgyeda mu yi?"

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Ana hom nnkenkaan dza David yɛe wɔ aber a ohiaa no
column4: na ɔkɔm dzee ɔnoara na hɔn a wɔka no ho no

column2: "Mbrɛ ɔkɛhɛɛn Nyankopɔn ne fie
column3: aber a Abiathar yɛ ɔsɔfopanyin no
column4: na okedzii kyerɛpaanoo a ɔmmfa mbra mu dɛ obiara dzi
column6: na ɔmaa hɔn a wɔka no ho no so bi no?"

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: na nnyɛ ahomgyeda ntsi na wɔyɛɛ nyimpa:"

column2: "dɛm ntsi nyimpa Ba no yɛ ahomgyeda no so mpo no wura."
